metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9512 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
rsync 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via asymlink attack on a file in the synchronization path.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9512` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.0-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-2ubuntu0.2').
